# customMirror

**Instance Property**

A mirror that reflects the `Int` instance.

## Declaration

```swift
var customMirror: Mirror { get }
```

## Describing an Integer

- **description**: A textual representation of this value.
- **hash(into:)**: Hashes the essential components of this value by feeding them into the given hasher.

items.description: A textual representation of this value.
items.name: description
